text: The King Faisal Foundation is an international philanthropic organization. It was started in 1976 with the mission of preserving and perpetuating King Faisalâ€™s legacy. It has a portfolio of investments. This allows it to keep creating and developing programs that serve its purpose. Since its establishment until 2019, KFF it spent over 2.3 billion Saudi Riyals to support its projects. == References == == Other websites == * * King Faisal Center for Research and Islamic Studies - official website * Peter Harrigan, 2000, Rays of Light and Brightness: The King Faisal International Prize , Saudi Aramco World Category:1976 establishments in Asia Category:Organizations based in Saudi Arabia
title: King Faisal Foundation
